title: Christmas marzipan stollen
ingredients: ['4 (8g) sachets dried active baking yeast', '150ml lukewarm milk', '1kg plain flour', '150g caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '360g pure butter (ghee), melted and cooled', '500g lemon peel, minced', '500g raisins', '100g ground almonds', '3 teaspoons rum', '1 lemon, zested', 'For the filling:', '200g marzipanrohmasse', '70g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon rum', 'For the garnish:', '2 tablespoons melted butter', 'icing sugar, as needed']
